body.p:
Joshua F. Speed Esq.
EXECUTIVE DEPARTMENT,
Frankfort, Ky., Feby 28, 1862.
Dear Sir:

You are hereby authorized and empowered by me to represent and settle the claims ^then paper vouchers^ of the State of Kentucky against the Federal Government incurred in raiding troops to aid in suppressing the present rebellion, and as the agent of the state to receive and receipt for from the Secretary of the Treasury of the United States all such ^whatever sum or^ sums of money may be due to the State of Kentucky under an act of Congress Approved July 27th 1861.
Appointed as Agent to settle Claims of Ky Against the United States
